#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sd(n) scanf("%d",&n)
int main()
{
    int t;
    sd(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long n,k,m,cur,ans=0;
        cin >> n >> k >> m;
        cur=n;
        while(1)
        {
            if((double)cur * (double)k>(double)m)break;
            cur=cur * k;
            ans++;
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
